metadata.title: CVE-2024-26608 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: ksmbd:fix global oob in ksmbd_nl_policy Similar to a reported issue (check thecommit b33fb5b801c6 ("net: qualcomm: rmnet: fix global oob inrmnet_policy"), my local fuzzer finds another global out-of-bounds read forpolicy ksmbd_nl_policy. See bug trace below:================================================================== BUG:KASAN: global-out-of-bounds in validate_nla lib/nlattr.c:386 [inline] BUG:KASAN: global-out-of-bounds in
